overview: Adrenaline (Francine don't look back).  A terrible evening when Francine learns the hard way that you should never take money from the ATM when a beast from outer space is on the prowl...  Film by Marine POIRSON and Lionel RICHERAND produced in 1995-1996 as part of the post-diploma "Image and Computer Workshop" at the National School of Decorative Arts (aii.ensad.fr).
title: Adrenaline
